Hints: Perhaps ****'s impressions on his meeting with Hans Christian Andersen informed the delineation of Uriah Heep.
This person painted by Ary Scheffer, 1855.
Prone to living beyond his means, John **** was imprisoned in the Marshalsea debtors' prison in Southwark London in 1824.
